name: Favoroski
description: Care Instructions: Dry Clean Only. Fit Type: Slim Fit. Fit Type: Slim Fit.SIZE GUIDE : Waist coat/Blazer size should be 6 Inch Over Your Jeans Waist Size (For Eg : If you Wear a 30 size Jeans your Waist coat size should be 36). Material: Cotton Blend with Polyester Lining. POCKETS: 1 Chest Pocket & 2 Side Pockets; BUTTONS:5.Suitable for: Business Work, Date, Party, Weddings, Engagement, Gift for Families, Friends and Boyfriend.Please Choose the Right Size Based on Your Chest Measurement from the Size Chart in Description
